title: COS
content:
0xD0FFB162F40A139C0x00238FE9// Cos
float COS(float value);Parameters:value: The number of degrees (in degrees, not radians)Returns: The cosine of the given numberReturns the cosine of the given number.Examples:Lua-- Get the heading
local heading = GetEntityHeading(PlayerPedId())
local cos = Cos(heading)

-- equivalent in lua
local cosLua = math.cos(heading * (math.pi / 180))
codeBlocks:
-- Get the heading
local heading = GetEntityHeading(PlayerPedId())
local cos = Cos(heading)

-- equivalent in lua
local cosLua = math.cos(heading * (math.pi / 180))
